urls.title: Video URLs
urls.description: List of TikTok video URLs to scrape (e.g., https://www.tiktok.com/@username/video/1234567890)

hashtags.title: Hashtags (Experimental)
hashtags.description: ⚠️ Hashtag scraping may be blocked by TikTok. Use direct video URLs for reliable results. List hashtags without # symbol (e.g., 'fyp', 'viral')

maxVideos.title: Max Videos
maxVideos.description: Maximum number of videos to scrape (per hashtag if multiple hashtags provided)

skipProfiles.title: Skip Profile Scraping
skipProfiles.description: Skip scraping profile data (bio, email, social links) for faster scraping
